mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_user (id, realm, code, name, password, status, remarks, extension, ip, login_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{entity.id}, #{entity.realm}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.extension}, #{entity.ip}, #{entity.loginTime}, now(), now()) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
